recipe.title: Watercress and Persimmon Salad with Champagne Vinaigrette
ingredients: 16 cups watercress (from 2 bunches), tough stems discarded
instructions: Whisk together vinegar, shallot, zest, 1/2 tsp salt, and 1/4 tsp pepper in a small bowl. Add oil in a slow stream, whisking until combined well. Peel persimmons and cut into 1/3-inch-thick wedges. Toss watercress with persimmons and enough vinaigrette to coat, then season with salt and pepper.
